snippet: After years in storage, the groundhog diorama at the Museum of Natural History celebrated its first Groundhog Day on display since 1999. No one seemed to notice.
abstract: After years in storage, the groundhog diorama at the Museum of Natural History celebrated its first Groundhog Day on display since 1999. No one seemed to notice.

headline.main: Prediction: This Groundhog Will Never Change
headline.print_headline: For This Groundhog, No More Years of Winter
